summary.label:
TP Test is a Singapore driving theory test practice app for Basic Theory Test (BTT), Final Theory Test (FTT) and Private Hire Car Driver Vocational Licence (PDVL) questions to get a driving licence. People are using TP Test to increase their chance of passing the theory tests on the very first try.

Passing the Basic Theory Test (BTT) is a compulsory requirement for obtaining the Singapore Driving Licence. Persons who wish to convert their foreign driving licence to a Singapore Driving Licence must also pass the BTT.

Learner drivers must pass the Final Theory Test (FTT) after passing the Basic Theory Test (BTT) to obtain a Provisional Driving Licence (PDL) which will allow them to drive on public roads with a qualified driving instructor as an "L" Plate learner driver.

Passing the Riding Theory Test (RTT) is a compulsory requirement for obtaining a driving license of type Motorcycle 2B in one of the driving centres of the Singapore Traffic Police. You must also complete your riding training course, and pass the Practical Riding Test (PRT) to obtain a Class 2B Motorcycle Licence.

The Singapore Land Transport Authority (LTA) has made it mandatory for all private hire car drivers to be properly licensed with a Private Hire Car Driver Vocational Licence (PDVL). There will be 2 test papers that the trainee needs to schedule after attending the training course.

A Taxi Driver Vocational Licence (TDVL) is needed before you can drive a taxi in Singapore. Vocational licences granted by the LTA ensure that drivers are properly trained. There will be 3 test papers that you need to schedule after attending the training course.

title.label: TP Test - BTT, FTT, RTT & PDVL - Shebin Leo Vincent
